category.name: Browsing
category.definition: Information about content the user has viewed that is not part of the app, such as websites. This is mostly attributed to cookies, and other similar third-party tracking tools.
category.benefits: Remembering who you are based on the third-party tracking tools.
category.consequences: Access to track the sites and apps you use outside of the app or website you are on, which has been a notable privacy concern since 1996 since the cookie tool was more publicly known.
